OOC: the bots are: (Unicronians): Spattercannon, Necross, Injustice, Nights=

"I'm afraid that we haven't anything to speak about... Th=
ose Silverwings riun our fun, then we have to start to destroy other thing"=

  "HEY!  WHY ARE YOU ATTACKING US?!?  CAN'T WE TA=
LK ABOUT THIS?" shouted Guardia from behind her shield.  She was slowly ste=
pping back, looking for some more permanent cover.  Her shield was very str=
ong and probably could survive another 20 minutes of direct fire, but she p=
referred to have a rock to hide behind and not have to deal with repairing =
the shield later. 

  Ravencheif now was climbing up a pile of rocks/hill t=
o his right.  He noticed the three warriors join the other two.  He started=
 to make a radio call while he continued to fire at the enemy.

  "{bzzzzzz=
} .... This is Ravencheif.... We are under attack by unknown enemies.   Ple=
ase help.... we are at the following coordinates.....", he then broadcast t=
heir coordinates and set the message to repeat so he wouldn't have to keep =
making the call. 

  "Guardia, you might want to bring the girl up here.  I=
f we get the high ground, we might stand a chance." said Ravenchief over th=
e radio.

  OOC: ok, so there are 5 bots joining the battle?  can someone e=
xplain who's who in an ooc in the next post... or something
